verses.roman:
bāhya-viraha-daśāya punaḥ bhrānti haila
'bhoga nā lāgāiluṅ',--ei jñāna haila

synonyms: bāhya-viraha—of external separation; daśāya—by the condition; punaḥ—again; bhrānti haila—there was illusion; bhoga—offering to the Deity; nā lāgāiluṅ—I have not given; ei—this; jñāna haila—you thought.
translation: "In the condition of external separation, you were again under illusion, thinking that you had not offered the food to Lord Viṣṇu.
